law.catch_line: Dissemination of information concerning roads and highways.

text.section: The Department of Highways may purchase space in magazines, newspapers, and other publications and may cause to be made and circulated all maps, prints, plans, lithographs, engravings, photographs, drawings, art work, and other specialized work deemed necessary in the dissemination of information concerning its roads and highways.

The Department of Highways, with the approval of the Governor, may expend an amount not in excess of two hundred and fifty thousand dollars ($250,000) a year for the purposes set out in subsection (1) hereof.
The provisions of KRS Chapter 57 shall not be applicable or controlling in the expenditure of this fund.

law.history: Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 47, secs. 1, 2 and 3.
